articles.description: Doctor Rob Chakraverty has left Wolves after two years at Molineux, the club have confirmed.

articles.title: Gary O'Neil: Bournemouth appoint 39-year-old to replace Scott Parker as permanent head coach - Sky Sports
articles.description: Gary O’Neil has agreed an 18-month deal to become the new Bournemouth boss after 12 matches as interim head coach.
articles.content:

articles.title: Wales' World Cup approach has been fundamentally flawed and changes are now needed - Wales Online
articles.description: Our fan columnist has given his take on what now needs to happen against England and beyond
articles.content:
Wales arent technically out of the World Cup but Friday's insipid defeat to Iran more or less ended any realistic hopes they had of making it through to the knock-out stages.
